markets.title: Will Kai Cenat cut their hair on stream before Oct 1, 2025?
markets.rules_primary: If Kai Cenat has their hair physically cut or removed from their head during a live stream after Issuance and before Oct 1, 2025, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary: The haircut must occur during a live broadcast on the streamer's official channel, not in pre-recorded content presented as live. The event must involve the actual removal of real hair from the streamer's head, be clearly visible on stream, and result in a change in hair length or style.
markets.early_close_condition: This market will close and expire early if the streamer cuts their hair on stream.
